Android Developer University of Texas at Dallas

2013 - 2014

  • Brain-Computer Interface for the ICU using Steady State Visually Evoked Potentials
    • A wireless system for patients in the ICU used to communicate with hospital staff without any physical interaction. It is designed for used by patients suffering from full-body paralysis as it requires them to simply look at a series of flashing options on a display.
    • Languages : Java, C
    • Frameworks : Android SDK, Android NDK, OpenGL, Eigen
